dict.acceptation: 教练；（铁路）旅客车厢；长途客运汽车；四轮大马车；
作指导；受训练[辅导]；坐马车旅行；

sent.orig: Current Atlanta Hawks coach Lenny Wilkens has won more basketball games than any other coach.
sent.trans: 亚特兰大鹰队的现任教练兰尼·威尔肯斯赢得的篮球比赛比其他任何教练都多。

sent.orig: Volunteer to coach or assistant coach a kids sports team.
sent.trans: 自愿去当孩子的运动教练或者助教。

sent.orig: Sell coach handbag wallet, wholesale handbag, wholesale coach handbag.
sent.trans: 出售教练手袋钱包，手袋批发，批发教练手袋。

sent.orig: Hello, and Ginza have a coach station to the airport bus, coach station is the origin.
sent.trans: 你好，银座和长途汽车站都有到机场的班车，长途汽车站是始发的。

sent.orig: Coach Chen disagrees with Coach Wang about it.
sent.trans: 对这件事陈教练和王教练意见不同。
